errors.message: library.app.LibraryApp.run references path variables (books_path, members_path, loans_path) in its method steps but the method signature declares no parameters. relationship.json leaves storage path ownership ambiguous; the blueprint does note this ambiguity. Preferable fixes: (a) add explicit path parameters to LibraryApp.run, or (b) document in notes that a higher-level caller must supply path values. This is a minor consistency issue and does not block generation.

summary: Blueprint is structurally valid and consistent with relationship.json; one minor warning about LibraryApp.run lacking explicit path parameters for repository calls.
